server.name: MCP-Mem0 Server with User Isolation
server.description: A Model Context Protocol server that provides coding preference management with complete user isolation using mem0 AI memory system.

tools.name: add_coding_preference
tools.description: Add a new coding preference to mem0 with user isolation. This tool stores code snippets, implementation details, and coding patterns for future reference. Each user's data is completely isolated. Note: Processing may take 30-60 seconds due to AI analysis.

text.description: The coding preference text to store

tools.name: get_all_coding_preferences
tools.description: Retrieve all stored coding preferences for the current user. Returns user-specific data only.

tools.name: search_coding_preferences
tools.description: Search through stored coding preferences using semantic search. Searches only the current user's data.

query.description: Search query for finding relevant coding preferences
